alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:31PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 415 PM MST... At 331 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cotton Center, or 11 miles north of Gila Bend, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buckeye, Cotton Center and Painted Rock Dam. This includes AZ Route 85 between mile markers 124 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
